comments:
Doing a debug launch in my target, I got an internal error printed to my console
(the OS console, not the Eclipse console) from the host. After the error occurs,
there is a thread in my host's debug view which shows as "<not responding>." I
believe it is the JDI Event Dispatcher spawned by the target. The error is:

Internal error logged from Debug UI:
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException[5010]:
com.sun.jdi.IncompatibleThreadStateException: Thread was not suspended.
